transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: This call is now being recorded.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hi sir, very good morning.
Customer: Hmm, boliye.
Executive: Sir, mai Roshan baat kar raha hu, Nikki ka manager IndiaMART office se.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji sir, bataye aapki call aa rahi thi hamare paas mein.
Customer: Hmm hmm, ek aapka failure se bada failure batata hu mai aapko.
Customer: Ji, sorry?
Customer: Aapka IndiaMART office se bada failure mai aapko batata hu mai.
Customer: Ha, bataye sir.
Customer: Kya hota hai na, kai baar humne kisi party ko bola ki bhai ye ye itna payment dal dijiye, hum aapka maal bhej rahe hai, thik hai?
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Usne humko phone karke bola ki aapka payment dal diya hai. Ab kya hota hai na, hum log busy schedule hota hai. Wo humko koi message bhejta hai, to hum log samajhte hai ki bhai payment aa gaya hoga.
Customer: Bilkul.
Customer: Hum maal bhej dete hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Uske baad wo party mujhe kehti hai ki payment nahi aaya tha, bank ka koi issue tha.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Thik hai, maine kaha abhi bhej do. To wo bola ki thik hai, mai bhej dunga.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Uske baad usne mera phone uthana band kar diya, thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai.
Customer: Uske baad maine IndiaMART se kai baar koshish ki, lekin aapse kuch hua nahi.
Customer: Accha.
Customer: Maine bhi socha ki ab doob gaya, koi matlab nahi, kyuki IndiaMART se kuch nahi hona hai. Aap sirf hamare upar pressure bana sakte hai, samne wale ko aap log kuch bhi nahi bigaad sakte hai. Mujhe jitna absorb kiya hua hai.
Customer: Okay, thik hai. Ab chaliye wo to mai bhul bhula gaya, koi baat nahi, wo do char mahine ki pehle ki baat hai. Aur aap nikal ke bhi kuch nahi de payenge unse.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm. Ab kya hai na, do char din pehle ek party ne mujhe payment bheja tha maal ke liye.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Ab shuruwat kya hua na, mere ghar pe koi hospital ki dikkat aa gayi thi.
Customer: Accha.
Customer: Jaise maine aapko ek do baar concern mein bataya tha ki meri mother ko cancer hai. To humko kabhi bhi urgent hospital jana padta hai.
Customer: Bilkul.
Customer: Us darmiyan mai uska maal bhej nahi paya do din. Lekin mujhe kharab ye laga ki wo mujhe raat ko 12 baje, 1 baje, jaise abhi payment bheja hai just.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Fir phone karna chalu kar diya, maal bhej diya, maal bhej diya, maal bhej diya. Itna to hota nahi hai. Ye to hand process hai na.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Maal aata hai, maal check hota hai, maal cut hota hai. Hmm, packing hoti hai, uske baad transportation, kai kai sare process hai, ab aap kya bataye, aap to bahar baithe hai, aapko kya malum?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To us darmiyan mein wo mujhe mere upar gande aarop lagana shuru kar diya. Lekin mai kuch bola nahi kyuki dekhiye kisi ka paisa liya hua hai to.
Executive: Exactly.
Customer: Apun ko wapas dena hai. Hum log koi fraud nahi. 20,000 se meri koi zindagi chalegi nahi. Koi vyapari ke mai ₹1 lakh ka subscription leta hu aapse, to mai aapse ₹20,000 rakh ke kya karunga batao kisi vyapari se.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Aur aapki company mujhe 50 phone kar chuki hai. Bolo. Ki aapne us party ka aisa kar diya, aisa kar diya. Aapke paas bina valuable proof hone ke aisa nahi karna chahiye kisi ke sath. Ab mai next time IndiaMART thodi lunga, mai bewakoof thodi hu jo mai IndiaMART pe bharosa karunga. Hamara paisa kuch lekin IndiaMART kisi aur ke paise kisi humse teen char baar, halaki maine uska paisa turant hi return kar diya tha.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Lekin aap log matlab itna concern karte hai matlab.
Executive: Sir, I think hamari is bare mein pehle bhi baat hui hai. Maine pehle bhi aapko bataya tha kya hota hai na, let's suppose ki hamare paas mein koi buyer aaya, thik hai?
Executive: Mai kya keh raha hu? Mere mere paise ko goli maar dijiye.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir, baat dono ko aapka aisa nahi hai ki hum aap pe blame put kar rahe hai. Abhi simple sa aapke against mein koi complaint aayi, thik hai? Kisi buyer ne complaint kara. To it was jo Nikki ne aapko call kara tha na, wo ek informative call thi ki sir aapke against mein hamare paas mein ek complaint aayi hui hai, to please aap dekh lijiye. Jis party ko maal diya, usne mujhe payment nahi bheja, uska aapne kya vichar diya?
Customer: Ha, uska. Wahi mai aapko keh raha hu ki jaise man lijiye mai dono concern aapka na point to point aapko solve karta hu. Pehli baat to pehle aapke wali baat karte hai. To let's suppose ki kisi se aapne as a buyer act kara, thik hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hai na? To agar wo IndiaMART pe registered hai as a kyuki aap hamare paas mein registered ho, aapki bahut sari puri ki puri responsibility IndiaMART pe banti hai agar hamare buyer ke sath mein kuch hoga. Kyuki sir aapse matlab anywhere buyer is most important thing. Hmm. Agar buyer IndiaMART pe rahega tabhi aap mere ko paisa de rahe ho, buyer IndiaMART pe nahi rahega to aap mujhe paisa nahi doge.
Customer: Hmm. Right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ye to baat aap bhi mante ho na?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ab sir buyer se ab knowingly, unknowingly aapne use maal bheja without taking your payment to kahin na kahin sir isme aapka miss hai, hamara isme koi miss nahi tha.
Customer: Chaliye thik hai. Thik hai, dhanyavad.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer complains about fraudulent buyer.

- Customer received calls about pending payment.

- Customer had to return payment due to hospital emergency.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the buyer's importance.

- Executive clarified the purpose of the call.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, payment, complaint, refund
